name: DragonSlayer (Asbestos)
description:
DragonSlayer is an 80's-inspired terminal-based game where you, a wizard, fights dragons!  That's all!

Features:
  • State of the art graphics!
  • Lifelike animations!
  • Color!
  • Revolutionizing sound-design!
  • Healing potions!
  • Secrets!
  • Easter-eggs!
Leaderboard:

To get on the leaderboard, please send an email to dragonslayer@helvete.be with your name and the top line of your save file.
